Our Work

We help you navigate technological change and its implications for people, business, society and the world around us. We do this by combining deep expertise in emerging technology with proven strategy, design and innovation methods.


We offer strategic advisory services and design and research consulting. We also develop cutting edge technology pilots and solutions.

Learn more
Strategy & Design

We provide executive level advisory services to help you understand the fundamentals of technological change. Our expert team of service designers, experience designers, technologists and product designers, seek to understand problems, navigate complexities, explore connections, and distil insights to inform tailored solutions.

Technology Experts

Our deep technology expertise allows us to actively develop pilots and proof-of-concepts. Through this piloting process we develop unique solutions in collaboration with our clients and community partners. We’d love to learn more about your company and see how we can work together to solve problems that matter.

All Posts

TypeHuman is located on the traditional lands of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin Nation. We pay our respects to Elders past, present and emerging. We also acknowledge that we are in a climate emergency. We call on those who govern us to implement ambitious policies and practices which prevent the harmful effects of climate change.

Find us at 1/20 Queen Street, Melbourne Victoria 3000
